means: 头脑镇定或沉着的状态

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... compose v 组成；作曲；使镇定 composure n 镇静，沉着 depose v 免职；沉淀.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... compose v 组成；作曲；使镇定 composure n 镇静，沉着 depose v 免职；沉淀.
云雀恭弥_百度百科 ... B：Black（ 黑色） C：Composure（ 冷静（composure）） D：Dolefulness（ 寂寞）.
对镇定(composure)较低的攻击型终场和前锋、设定为经常远射的球员有用。　　没有以上属性的球员避免学习。

list.abs: "composure"... ... Auto composure 自动构图; composure regain 恢复镇静; AI Pitcher Composure Influence 电脑投手心情的影响.
守 guard守 keep composure守 static
he showed great composure in difficult situations ., 他在困难环境中表现得极沉着.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent. (in the sense 'composing, composition'): from compose + -ure

entry.def: Composure is the appearance or feeling of calm and the ability to control your feelings.

example.ex: For once Dimbleby lost his composure. It was all he could do to stop tears of mirth falling down his cheeks...
example.tran: 这一次丁布尔比没能控制住自己的感情。他唯一能做的也就是不让欢乐的泪水流下脸庞。

example.ex: Stopping only briefly to regain her composure, she described her agonising ordeal.
example.tran: 她只停顿了一小会儿让自己恢复平静，然后讲述了她无比痛苦的经历。

sentences.sentence: "he accepted their problems with composure and she with equanimity"

auth_sentence.content: The second half was all about composure and patience.
auth_sentence.res_content: The second half was all about composure and patience.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The second half was all about composure and patience.

auth_sentence.content: Strangely enough, Mr. Tharoor advised calm and composure.
auth_sentence.res_content: Strangely enough, Mr. Tharoor advised calm and composure.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Strangely enough, Mr. Tharoor advised calm and composure.

auth_sentence.content: There is also substance beneath the Scandinavian composure.
auth_sentence.res_content: There is also substance beneath the Scandinavian composure.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There is also substance beneath the Scandinavian composure.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 作品,作文,乐曲;作曲;结构,组成,成分
stems_affixes.word_buile: com共同+pos放+ition表名词→放到一起→组合→作文
com一起+pos放+ure表名词→[精神]放到一起→镇静

stems_affixes.value_cn: 暴露, 揭露, 暴光
stems_affixes.word_buile: ex出+pos放+ure表名词→放到外面→暴露
op对+pos放+ite表名词→n.相反的事物
pos放+ture状态→放的状态→姿势→态度
sup在下面+pos放+ition表名词→放在下面的[想法]→推测

stems_affixes.value_cn: 令取某种姿势, 摆姿势, 作出姿态
stems_affixes.word_buile: pos放+ture状态→放的状态→姿势→态度

Sentence.sentence: It seems that men with traditional views of masculinity are more likely to suppress outward emotions and to fear emotions, supposedly because such feelings may lead to a loss of composure (镇定).
Some men believe that if they expressed their emotions openly they might lose composure

sentences.en: Throughout the crisis he retained his composure.
sentences.cn: 危机期间, 他始终保持镇定。

sentences.en: He wondered at her composure in such a crisis.
sentences.cn: 他很惊讶,在这样的危机中,她竟泰然自若。
